titles.title: Ensuring Friendly Skies for Passengers Act
Ensuring Friendly Skies for Passengers Act

To eliminate the exemption of air carriers from the authority of the Federal Trade Commission and to prohibit certain unfair and deceptive acts and practices relating to air carrier delays, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Friendly Skies for Passengers Act
This bill provides the Federal Trade Commission authority to enforce against air carriers certain unfair and deceptive trade practices. It also prohibits air carriers from selling tickets for, delaying, or cancelling a flight when the air carrier knows or should know it does not have sufficient staff to operate the flight.
